name: Girl and arrow
description:
Girl and arrow is a top-down shooter (archery) game. In the game, a little girl must collect the keys, open the access to a safe zone and escape the monster's lair. You must use any props in the environment or a bow and arrow in your hand to kill monsters and collect keys around them. Remember not to get hurt by environmental props while using them.  

Features:
  • Can choose different levels of difficulty
  • Fantastic music
  • Thinking, strategy
  • Exciting game atmosphere
  • Score system, display score
